multiplechoiceresponse.label: What is the role of the Vector Quantized Latent Space in the text-to-image generation process?
multiplechoiceresponse.description: You can add an optional tip or note related to the prompt like this.

choicegroup.choice: To provide a discrete set of tokens for classification loss
To encode the text input into a latent representation
To generate the final image pixels
To perform super-resolution on the generated image
